PLAY.TITLE: The Merchant of Venice

PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae
PERSONAE.PERSONA: BASSANIO, his friend, suitor likewise to Portia.
LAUNCELOT GOBBO, the clown, servant to SHYLOCK.
Magnificoes of Venice, Officers of the Court of Justice, Gaoler, Servants to Portia, and other Attendants.

PLAY.SCNDESCR: SCENE Partly at Venice, and partly at Belmont, the seat of PORTIA, on the Continent.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Venice. A street.
SCENE II: Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
SCENE III. Venice. A public place.
SCENE I. Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Flourish of cornets. Enter the PRINCE OF MOROCCO
and his train; PORTIA, NERISSA, and others
attending

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Venice. A street.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter Old GOBBO, with a basket
Enter BASSANIO, with LEONARDO and other followers

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. The same. A room in SHYLOCK'S house.
SCENE IV. The same. A street.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter GRATIANO, LORENZO, SALARINO, and SALANIO

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. The same. Before SHYLOCK'S house.
SCENE VI. The same.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter JESSICA, above, in boy's clothes

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VII. Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Flourish of cornets. Enter PORTIA, with the
PRINCE OF MOROCCO, and their trains
Exit with his train. Flourish of cornets

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VIII. Venice. A street.
SCENE IX. Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Flourish of cornets. Enter the PRINCE OF ARRAGON,
PORTIA, and their trains

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Venice. A street.
SCENE II. Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter BASSANIO, PORTIA, GRATIANO, NERISSA, and
Attendants

SPEECH.SPEAKER: PORTIA
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Music, whilst BASSANIO comments on the caskets to himself

SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter LORENZO, JESSICA, and SALERIO, a Messenger
from Venice

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. Venice. A street.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter SHYLOCK, SALARINO, ANTONIO, and Gaoler

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter PORTIA, NERISSA, LORENZO, JESSICA, and
BALTHASAR

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. The same. A garden.
SCENE I. Venice. A court of justice.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter the DUKE, the Magnificoes, ANTONIO, BASSANIO,
GRATIANO, SALERIO, and others
Enter NERISSA, dressed like a lawyer's clerk

SPEECH.SPEAKER: DUKE
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Enter PORTIA, dressed like a doctor of laws

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The same. A street.
SCENE I. Belmont. Avenue to PORTIA'S house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter BASSANIO, ANTONIO, GRATIANO, and
their followers
